title: Ep 2584 - Garba With A Twist
shortDesc: Everyone in the Gokuldham society is eagerly waiting for the Nacho Orchestra to arrive so they could start the Garba nights but when the orchestra arrives in the society, everyone is shocked

title: Ep 2585 - The Garba Fun
shortDesc: The Garba Nights continue as the Nacho Orchestra continue to mesmerize the Gokuldham Society members with their unique style of Garba songs.

title: Ep 2586 - Everyone Waits
shortDesc: While all the men are waiting for Popatlal to arrive at Abdul's shop to have some soda and chat session, Popatlal is stuck with a couple on the road who claim that their daughter is sick

title: Ep 2587 - The Lottery Ticket
shortDesc: Popatlal comes back to the Gokuldham society and sit with the men and enjoys his soda session as he tells them why he got late. Popatlal also tells them about the lottery ticket

title: 29 October 2018 - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - The Midnight Assignment
shortDesc: Popatlal gets a call from his boss, who asks him to go on an assignment. After learning that Sonia, a reporter from Delhi will be accompanying him, Popatlal agrees to go on the assignment.

title: Ep 2589 - Winning The Lottery
shortDesc: Bhide finds out that Popatlal has won the 1cr. lottery and has become a crorepati now so he gathers all the Gokuldham society members and gives them the good news.

title: Ep 2590 - Losing The Ticket
shortDesc: Everyone in the Gokuldham Society gathers outside Popatlal's house and when they inform him that he has won the lottery, he goes crazy. So he deiced to take all the members to Goa on a trip that he'll pay for.

title: Ep 2591 - Finding The Laundry Man
shortDesc: Popatlal informs and explains everyone in the society how he put the winning lottery ticket in the shirt which he gave in the laundry but later they find out that the laundry shop is closed.

title: Ep 2592 - In Search of the Lottery Ticket
shortDesc: Popatlal, accompanied by Gokuldham society members, arrives at the Dhobi Ghat in search of the laundry man, who took his shirt and along with it the lottery ticket.  The laundry man, known as Kallu Dhobi, is nowhere to be found.

title: Ep 2593 - The Missing Lottery Ticket
shortDesc: Popatlal gathers the courage to speak with Kallu Dhobi about the lottery ticket. Kallu Dhobi's heart melts after hearing that Popatlal is from Gokuldham society.

title: Ep 2594 - Following The Trail
shortDesc: All the men are out trying to follow the trail of the lottery ticket as they realize that the ticket has been forwarded over and over again so they follow the same trail.

title: Ep 2595 - Popatlals Act Of Kindness
shortDesc: All the men gather in a park after they get to know that the lottery ticket might be there but when Popatlal gets in the possession of the lottery ticket, he gives it away to Manohar who gave him the ticket in the first place.

title: Ep 2596 - Preparations For Diwali
shortDesc: Everyone in Gokuldham Society appreciates Popatlal for not accepting the winning amount of the lottery and giving it back to Manohar and how he has set an example for everyone else.

title: Ep 2597 - The Diwali Pooja
shortDesc: Everyone in the Gokuldham society is excited for the Diwali as they get their best dresses out for the Pooja. Dr. Hathi brings the sweets and snacks for everyone

title: Ep 2598 - Popatlal Brings The Crackers
shortDesc: Champaklal Gada tells everyone about the significance of the Lakshmi Pooja during Diwali as the priest does the rituals. Popatlal brings the crackers for everyone in the society.
